title: HALLOWEEN!
body: When it is Halloween will underworld {{champion:4}} be available?

replies.body:
So you don't even know how to use a calendar now? 

What has this community come to...
Wait what? So it's like mystery date now?

Probably not. Riot said that LoL Events will no longer be determined by our calendar, but rather happen randomly throughout the year.

Although in previous years, "The Harrowing" (LoL Halloween), has happened during Halloween, last year Riot released a statement saying that The Harrowing may in fact happen at any point of the year and will not necessarily fall on Halloween anymore.

So yes, it will probably be back sometime this year, but no, its not guaranteed to be on Halloween.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/10/red-post-collection-one-for-all-live.html#5
Usually yes that skin is available at that  time.
